title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, April 25, 2014
description: With the FCC's announcement, we look at Net Neutrality and who would pay for an internet “fast lane." Plus, more on the technology behind Disney’s Audio-Animatronics exhibits at the 1964 World’s Fair. Also, Farhad Manjoo, tech columnist for the New York Times, joins us for Silicon Tally, our quiz on the week in tech news.
